lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: What is better than giving people money?  Making them give it back!
lenders.occupational_info: My occupation is jogging inside a large hamster wheel to generate power for a regional (and now socialized) financial institution.  I am paid in five pound blocks of expired government cheese.  I trade these for cigarettes which I subsequently sell to disabled veterans down at the docks.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I like to help small business' succeed
lenders.occupational_info: I look after computer networks and make them safe

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I respect people who have small businesses and I understand how difficult it is to keep it going. I like to help  people who are trying  to make a better life for themselves, their families, and their communities. I would like people all over the world to know that Americans are generous and caring people.
lenders.occupational_info: As a marketing professional I am a communicator who specializes in health care marketing. I develop ways for businesses to tell their customers about their business. Sometimes this takes the form of an ad, a brochure, a website, a radio commercial, or a letter that is mailed to customers.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: The money can be reused and reused to help people in diffrent palces
lenders.occupational_info: Just doing my job as a citizen of hte world

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes we all just need a little help from our friends. I want someone else in the world to feel successful!
lenders.occupational_info: I design and decorate sets for TV commercials. It's an incredible job, as I am freelance and get to work with different people & in different environments on a regular basis!

lenders.name: Nancy and Mike
lenders.loan_because: We want to help to promote independence
lenders.occupational_info: I am a physician and my wife is a musician and home maker

lenders.name: Stephanie and Max
lenders.loan_because: I loan not because I really can afford to, but because I want to; it makes me happy. If I could, I would loan thousands of dollars because it's the right thing to do. I see these faces - they humble me and speak to my heart. It's almost like having family members all across the world - and for me there's nothing like family.

lenders.name: Jeff,Holly,and children/grandson Wyatt
lenders.loan_because: We want to help

lenders.name: Sebastian & DIego
lenders.loan_because: our parents want to teach us that helping one another will make the world better.  They make loans on our behalf.
lenders.occupational_info: our parents work for a major telecommunication company.  Sebastian and DIego spend their days laughing, playing, and napping.

lenders.name: linda from Indiana
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone who is trying to better himself and who has a clear idea of how to do that.  I can  help with some of the money needs. needed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired foreign language teacher.

lenders.name: Pat & Denise
lenders.loan_because: God has given us so much here in the USA. It Is a blessing to share some of ourselves with those less fortunate.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place and I love people from all walks of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I make the pages that you visit on the internet and help you find them in search engines.

lenders.name: Liane
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life by people who believe in me.  I believe people who want to improve should be given the opportunity to improve without having to beg or plead.  Afterall, we are all brothers and sisters on this planet and in this lifetime.  Nothing feels better than unconditional love and support!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 9 and 10 year olds math, spelling, science, the history of California, and how to read for deeper enjoyment and understanding!

lenders.name: Ron & Joanna
lenders.occupation: Regional Sales Manager & Human Services Manager
lenders.loan_because: We feel strongly about empowering  people to pursue their dreams!  We also what to give individuals the opportunity to support their families!  Everyone deserves a chance!  Best of luck and much success to all the wonderful businesses that will be started through Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am the Manager of Employment Programs for Easter Seals Crossroads.  This organization is a community resource working in partnership with children and adults with disabilities or special needs and their families to promote growth, independence and dignity. 

My husband is a North American Sales Manager for a Taiwanese Wire and Cable Company.

lenders.name: Angeliki
lenders.loan_because: I want to help her and help her children.
lenders.occupational_info: 4th grade student

lenders.name: Carole
lenders.loan_because: My life is blessed in so many ways and I feel certain that sharing is the right thing to do.  In order to receive I must give!!!
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to ensure that no one ends their life afraid, alone and in pain

lenders.name: Flame
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to work.      I would like to help others have an easier life and donate an hour of my work.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a nurse, who works in a nursing home, and cares for 30 older people.
 In my free time, I volunteer for Red Cross and I am also a CASA worker.

lenders.name: Bette & Jan
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: There is such a great need in the world.  The Good Lord has blessed me abundantly and my hearts  desire is to bless someone else in realizing their dreams for themselves as well as their family. My hope is that  those whom I have blessed through God, they in turn will be a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Restaurant Industry and I am a waitress/server. I deal with the general public in making sure you have a pleasurable dining experience and meal.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I should. What else? Well, as the US economy collapses under the brunt of bad lending practices, microloans inspire me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a toy company and make the signs for their stores.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Kayt
lenders.loan_because: I have always enjoyed helping others when ever I can.

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: need to give back

lenders.name: Karyn
lenders.loan_because: it's only right to share our bounty with those who are less fortunate. We are all citizens of the same planet, regardless of what country we call home.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the day-to-day operations of a fundraising office in the College of Arts and Sciences at a large research university.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams and make a better life for them and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a hotel and manage the Catering Department in Sales and planning of weddings and other special events.

lenders.name: Pravin
lenders.loan_because: some guy called Gandhi said "Poverty is the worst form of violence". So me no want violence.

lenders.name: Siobhan
lenders.occupation: Wife & Mother of 2 & Car Wash owner
lenders.loan_because:
I like the idea of global helpfulness.
Let's help everyone be successful and we will be successful...
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just like you working hard to raise loving, caring, smart human beings.

lenders.name: Miguel
lenders.loan_because: i've never done something like this before. i hope it helps.
lenders.occupational_info: manage a hospital laboratory

lenders.name: Silvia
lenders.loan_because: Because its better to give than to recieve
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Graphic Designer

lenders.name: L Danyetta
lenders.loan_because: I love making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others achieve their personal, leadership and business goals.

lenders.name: Viorica
lenders.loan_because: As a woman living an extremely fortunate lifestyle, I feel it is my duty to help other women support themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Anything I can do to make a difference in the life of someone else brings joy to me, too.  I want to loan primarily to people living in Mexico because most of my students come from Mexico and I know how difficult life there can be.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children who are English language learners.  I speak Spanish and am able to be a bilingual teacher to my bilingual English/Spanish speakers.  I LOVE my job!  I get to teach, make a daily difference, be an advocate and a revolutionary!  I am so lucky.

lenders.name: Acacia
lenders.loan_because: It is a very effective way to help a person help himself/herself.  Hopefully, extreme poverty can be eliminated one person at a time.  I also sponsor children in the third world countries hoping it will help children there break the poverty cycle.
lenders.occupational_info: I do project control. My main responsibilities includes handling the financials/forecasting/reporting of a large project team, business control matters, etc.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: Price is right wholesale is an on-line clothing store, that provides quality name brand items at affordable prices.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea that I can dramatically impact the life of someone with a relatively small amount of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that rents heavy construction equipment to companies who only need it for a short time.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I know first-hand how much it helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend school at a university in North Carolina. I'm majoring in Spanish and minoring in Psychology. I love learning different languages and I also like to work at the dry cleaners. I have many wonderful customers that I see each week. I love the advice they give me.

lenders.name: Jim Stewart
lenders.loan_because: Those with the most must help those with the least.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Because I believe that raising a family is hard work and that sometimes you just need a little help to have a happy, healthy family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a bookstore part-time, and I am a hands-on grandmother.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone at some point in their life has had help achieving a dream...I want to give back in honor of those who helped me make my dream a reality.
"Dream as though you'll live forever, Live as if you'll die today"
lenders.occupational_info: I care for those who need medical attention

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I receive happiness from helping other people unconditionally.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate workers to build homes for rich people.

lenders.name: Eddie & Elaine
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy the excitement of providing opportunities for those who want to improve their lives as well as their communities.
lenders.occupational_info:
He: Works at a University School of Medicine
She: Works for a doctor

lenders.name: Andrew and Julie
lenders.loan_because: I love the direct effect i can have on someone else's life!

lenders.name: Tekla
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate to live in a country with free healthcare, a social service system which helps people when they are in need, a banking system that will loan money when you need it and even if you do not.  The public school system is free through high school and if you cannot afford to go to University you can get grants and loans. In Canada we find fault with those systems and complain about what is wrong with them instead of appreciating what is right about them. We are only limited by the effort we want to put into our lives to better them. I think it is our obligation to share our good fortune.

lenders.name: brian
lenders.loan_because: I think that we all have a gift to give, and if that gift is helping another person have a better life, we gain more than we will ever give!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people do things that they sometimes think are too hard or too complicated.  I help people with technology.

lenders.name: Shelli
lenders.loan_because: Individuals around the world deserve the trust and availability of money that will make their lives a little bit easier. Also, I feel like I am making a differene in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: In my job I analyze financial information and help my team make decisions about loaning other companies money.

lenders.name: Noreen
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to succeed.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to take care of their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a nurse and a mother

lenders.name: Carole
lenders.loan_because: I can... and wish more people would
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Special Education teacher and take great pleasure in being able to help those who need just a little extra support to "make it" in this world.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I want poverty to become history and if loaning $25.00 will make a difference in someone elses life, I am thankful I can be a apart of that change.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to!

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: Im a seamstess also and want to help any woman who is in need of money for sewing clothes or etc...
lenders.occupational_info: I opened a small business in Tx and I sew alot and I make great gifts

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: a small loan can transform a whole family's life and future.  It gives me great joy  to aid families around the world in fulfilling their dreams for a  livelihood and better life for themselves and their children.

lenders.name: antoinette
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people
lenders.occupational_info: retired after 27 years with at&t.  own a property management company and in process of opening a transitional home for girls

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe that we have to "give back" some of the benefits we have.  I am fortunate to lack nothing--so I should help others who have need.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach writing to first year college students.

lenders.name: SHAHNAZ
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Alex Morgan
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to people who really could use my money.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freshman in college, studying English and Political Science.  I plan on going to Law School, and hopefully making a positive impact on this world.

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: to give someone a chance
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital

lenders.name: carrie
lenders.loan_because: You never realize how good you have things, until you learn of someone that nedds just a few dollars to change their life.

lenders.name: E.Ita
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we all need a little help from our friends.

lenders.name: Victoria J
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at being self-sufficient and the opportunity to achieve.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are working to better there lives.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want my children to learn generosity by seeing it in action.  And faith without works is dead.
lenders.occupational_info: I am married, with two young children.  I want my children to know there is a big world beyond our borders, and it is full of wonderful people.

lenders.name: Kristie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone else's life.  God has given  me a chance to help someone and I feel it is my responsibility to lend a hand to help a person who needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that distributes medical products to hospitals.  As a  medcial sales rep I work with laboratories in hospitals to make sure they receive the medical products they ordered to use in the lab.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I heard about this on Oprah -- what a great idea!  I lived in Liberia as a child, so I'm honored to help someone in a nearby country to build a business!

lenders.name: Venesha
lenders.loan_because: I can remember the times when 25$ made all the difference in the world for my family. When I was a small child my father served time in jail because another man became violent towards my mother and my father defended her. Unfortunetly my father hurt that man and was found guilty of assult. My mother was expecting her 2nd child, my little sister at that time. My father had been our primary provider. We had nothing. It was because so many people gave to us that we were able to survive. I will never forget those simple acts of kindness.
lenders.occupational_info: As a nurse I care for those who can no longer care for themselves. It is draining work, yes. But when my patients or their families thank me for the care I have given, that thanks is all the reward I could ever ask for.

lenders.name: jerri
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help.  I am especially wanting to loan money to people to start their own businesses.  This is a wonderful program.I am so glad I found it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am now retired.  I have 15 grandchildren 3 of which are great grandchildren.  I am so blessed. by them

lenders.name: denise
lenders.loan_because: It is what I can do to help another person.

lenders.name: Patti ANDERSEN
lenders.loan_because: I want to help  single or widowed women who are trying to survive the best they can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach the "nuts and bolts" of entertainment in Hollywood: how to make a living in "show biz" in front or behind the camera

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: Because I am a human being.  I feel that everyone should have a chance to do great things!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because:
I like spreading my good luck to women in other countries.

Be well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an electrical engineer, laying out computer chips that go into copy/scanner/fax machines.

lenders.name: Greta
lenders.loan_because: I know the need to want to make your life better and sometimes all you need is for someone else to believe in you!
lenders.occupational_info: I sing, I paint, I make music and films, anything that makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.occupational_info: I am a corporate trainer and a college professor.  I teach technology and computer classes.

lenders.name: Mark and Jessica
lenders.loan_because: We feel very lucky for our lives.   We want to help people around the world achieve their dreams!

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I heard about this organization on the Oprah show and my immediate reaction was - "what a cool thing to do".  I enjoy helping people however I can and if this is one way that I can give back to the world and help someone in the process - I love it!  I'm impressed with the number of people who are trying to establish their own business.  I would love to do that some day, but never thought it possible - but perhaps, maybe someday I will.  This is very inspirational!
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves engaging and partnering with individuals and groups every day.  I manage all of our supervisory, leadership and management training.  As well, I help organizations become more effective through providing organization development support.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: it is a small thing that can have a big impact!!

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful that through some hard-work, life has been good to me.  I hope that by being a member of Kiva I can help someone else get ahead in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the Finance and Administration for an HIV Research Center

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: Because we are blessed.  When we were struggling, Christian friends  helped us & now we are able to  bless someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a home educator to our teenage son.   We choose to keep our son at home and teach him our own family values.

lenders.name: Cindy and Bruce
lenders.loan_because: To help others realize their dreams and better their quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: Education

lenders.name: Kathlene
lenders.occupational_info: Helping businesses to optimize their process operations to provide products while being environmentally responsible.

lenders.name: Josie630
lenders.loan_because: I would hope someone would help me, if need be.
lenders.occupational_info: Blessed

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: When you bless others, you always receive more blessings in return. The true value of giving is knowing your gift has given value to the life of another.
lenders.occupational_info: I do all I can to protect our earth and bring love to all.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their full potential and help them become successful in life.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is challengeing and rewarding.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the mission of KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with disadvantaged youth.

lenders.name: LATASHA
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a home-based business in which I design custom products for other home-based and small business owners such as business cards, postcards, forms, other printed material that will help them promote their businesses without spending a lot of money.

lenders.name: Kari
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the idea of "paying it forward"  to those who might need a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Finance Manager at a car dealership and a Certified Interior Redesigner

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I want to see businesses do as well as I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I plan and organize events and parties for businesses

lenders.name: Laura G.
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Sunnie Austin-Sellers
lenders.loan_because: helping people help themselves - the true gift of giving

lenders.name: ron and family
lenders.loan_because: The true dividend from giving is knowing that you've made a difference --  a few dollars at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I help design and build data centers that house thousands of computers which run applications for a global investment bank.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people succeed!  I also lost a precious pet of mine, and I needed to give back for all the wonderful years of joy he gave us.  It makes me feel good inside.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people in travel plans over the internet.  They can travel by plane, car, cruise ship.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: this is a WONDERFUL way to change the life of someone
lenders.occupational_info: When storms hit my country and cause widespread devestation, I go to the site to help people

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I know that there have been times in the lives of myself, my mother and my friends that a small amount of money would have made a huge difference.  It gives me great pleasure to invest in someone else and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I work for a company that rents and sells equipment to construction companies.  My job is to make everything run smoothly in the office, so that the shop and the salesman can concentrate on their jobs.

lenders.name: cathy
lenders.loan_because: I like to empower women to prosper through  running thier own business.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Karina
lenders.loan_because: "The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches, but to reveal to him his own."

lenders.name: Bailey Road Kitty
lenders.loan_because: sometimes all someone needs is a chance.

lenders.name: Beverlee
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed with spiritual abudance in my life, I want to share my blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired because of the Multiple Sclerosis.

lenders.name: Vern
lenders.loan_because: It's a great idea and program.  Spread the wealth!

lenders.name: Coop
lenders.loan_because: i've been blessed.

lenders.name: margaret
lenders.loan_because: "Feeling bad" for others does not change anything. Compassion and action does.

lenders.name: Emilie
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise funding for an art museum.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: Traveling to West Africa many times has changed my perspective on so many aspects of life.  I have seen firsthand the conditions in which people work each day to be self sufficient and to provide for their families - especially in the rural areas.  They need the support of people from the rest of the world to improve their lives.   Despite this, so many people are friendly, proud and hopeful and so interested in bettering their lives and the lives of their families.  My family and I are very fortunate to live as we do, and I want to give something to others to help them achieve better lives.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.occupation: owner of a dog waste removal service

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: Pay it forward
lenders.occupational_info: Finance

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I CAN

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I'm so impressed with how many people take the initiative to start their own businesses.  I'm also impressed by the wide variety of businesses out there.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in sales for a software company.  I visit customers to discuss the technical capabilities of our software.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to dream about starting a business and lacking funds.  Just want to help someone else realize their dream.

lenders.name: Katy
lenders.loan_because: This is how we change the world for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the associate director for a non-profit social services agency in Minnesota serving men, women and children in crisis.

lenders.name: cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I've been very fortunate in my life and always give back to others in need.  Its a warm feeling to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I was in banking and real estate for 15 years. Good people gave me chances and I worked very hard to be successful...

lenders.name: Marlene
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help.  We all need help at some point in our lives.  It feels good to know that you don't have to be rich to help.

lenders.name: Keith, Allyson & Family
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed with the life I have and would like to help others feel the same way!

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: this is such a great thing to do!

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I am a home care agent for the elderly

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed, and I like to share my blessings!
lenders.occupational_info: I create documents, guides and training for my company.

lenders.name: Amber and MJ
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I own a business and know the power of someone believing in you enough to loan to your dream. We have been given so much and to whom much is given much is expected! We also want our daughter to grow up giving, and this is a great way for her to participate and learn about other people's way of life!

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: I admire people in business that are trying to make in difference in their lives. I have struggled for many years to start my own business; I'm now a travel agent with Expedia.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach fitness exercises to groups with osteoporosis or injuries, these exercises are specialized movements which helps the groups to use their joints and bones better in their daily lives.

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in peoples lives and this is the best feeling ever!!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find and sell their homes

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: Opportunities to get ahead abound in the U.S.  We have many safety nets and social services available to those who are struggling.  Kiva allows me to provide that same opportunity to those living in countries that don't provide such blessings!

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to make capital available to folks who might otherwise not have access to it. Plus, I love the fact that each donation becomes revolving capital to reinvest over and over again. KIVA is now my go-to gift idea - truly, a gift that keeps on giving!

lenders.name: TONYA
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense. Not only does it make sense, it provides me with an opportunity to give of what I have to change someone else's life. That's a GREAT feeling!
lenders.occupational_info: My job as a Public Health Educator is to protect, promote, and preserve the health of the world's people. I study the social, economic, political, and cultural dynamics that impact the overall health of the world.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone less fortunate to better themselves and to live their dreams.

lenders.name: Daria
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy lending a hand-up to others in our global community.  I appreciate that Kiva gives me a chance to share.  This organization makes it fun and easy.
lenders.occupational_info: retired teacher

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: i understand the power of giving, and the importance of the unselfish act.
lenders.occupational_info: i help review and write legal contracts for people and businesses.

lenders.name: kasey
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should be afforded the oppertunity to live a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a store selling cell phones

lenders.name: ANDY
lenders.loan_because: I simply feel that helping others is the only true way to enrich ones own purpose and spirit in life. To be able to give to people you don't know, to make a difference in some dark corner of the world, to contribute to some small measure of improvement in an isolated place that someone calls home, is to me - the ultimate statement of humanity,   kindness and love.
lenders.occupational_info:
I design, configure and build backbone fiber-optic networks that provide Internet & private communications to millions of users across the United States and around the world. (Cisco CCIE Engineer)

Hobbies:
travel, photography & enjoying life! :)
(Routing packets is fun!)

lenders.name: Lavon

lenders.name: Mary

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.

lenders.name: Lunaria

lenders.occupational_info: Ive been gainfully employed with the US Postal Service for well over a decade now. I dont think that my job is much to brag about but I am very grateful to have it . My job has enabled me to provide a respectable lifestyle and standard of living for myself and my son. Im proud of the life and little world Ive created for us. I think Ive done a pretty good job and it is only because of where I work that Ive been able to do as well as I have.

lenders.name: roger

lenders.name: Catherine

lenders.occupational_info: I both paint and write to express inspiration, joy, peace and contemplation in a world that often moves too quickly for our soul to process. My art and poems hope  to give people a place to both rest and renew.

By Day - Hard Hat Girl
By Night - International Financier

I was in Zimbabwe for three months while in college and was able to help someone with a gift of 20 USD. I was able to see the difference that  can be made by helping one person.  So every month when I get paid I provide a loan to others that need a loan hoping to make a difference.

lenders.name: Nik & Tonia

lenders.name: Price Family

We firmly believe we are not citizens of only a country, we think as ourselves as citizens of the world.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I can make a positive difference in someones life.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband is a dentist, and I am currently looking for employment.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: What a wonderful way to be a world citizen

lenders.name: Brice
lenders.loan_because: I've seen how much a little can do in someone's life. Because I want to help, but faceless charities aren't for me. Because someday, once I am done with school, I want to do micro financing as a job, but I'm not patient enough to wait that long.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently am going to University, but to pay for this I work at a few different jobs. I am an office assistant (I file papers, do computer work and answer phones for a company). I also manage the sound equipment for my University (set-up speakers, rent out equipment and make sure all our equipment works).

lenders.name: jeri
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help  make someones  life better.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm lucky enough to be older and not work outside of my home

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I find it thrilling to think I can help someone on the other side of the world, with just a small investment.  I hope to continue this for the rest of my life, I enjoy watching the progress of the patrons, and wish I could send them a message to say, good work, well done, you make me so proud,.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: this is a unique opportunity to be part of a team of like-minded individuals making a small investment with an enormous impact.  That the investment returns as the loans are repaid and can continue to work for others makes it brilliant.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for various publications and also volunteer time to local, national and international organizations, particularly those  involved with the preservation of heirloom plants and seeds.

lenders.name: Cati
lenders.loan_because:
I feel karmically obligated.
"Investing in women is the most sustainable way to grow a community." Prince Charles, in Harmony
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a library at a college. I help people learn to write and how to gather and assemble information.

lenders.name: Marianne
lenders.loan_because: I can't afford to give money when I don't know if my money is going directly to the cause.  This organization seems great and I am glad to help.  I usually only give to Native American causes.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a famous tourist attraction and clean up after very messy people.

lenders.name: Ute Sonja
lenders.loan_because: I like to see that people are helped to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I am a self-employed artist, and want to help out where I can-- what a great way to assist other folks around the world.  Kiva, you rock!
lenders.occupational_info: Musician/actor/comedian

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky to be able to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: Writing and editing--but mostly taking care of Baby H.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: mkd
lenders.loan_because: OPRAH for president!! As a single parent, I struggled for years with expenses relating to feeding, clothing, housing and educating my children. Luckily, I was born "middle class" in the United States and had the opportunity to educate myself. So, I already had a good career and still could not make ends meet. I loan because I want to assist parents in their effort to protect, house, educate and raise healthy children.
lenders.occupational_info: In my work as a counselor (therapist/ mental health professional), I listen to others and help provide solutions to problems by talking, coaching and consultation. With KIVA, I can help by giving financially.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: My Dad loaned me money to buy land for my first home and a bank loaned me money to start my own business.I wouldn't be where I am today without that "start up" help .It's time to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people to learn to walk and move again without pain

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I want to pay it forward!

lenders.name: FluffyStarr
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who may not have the kind of opportunities I have living in Canada.
lenders.occupational_info: I sing, and make music, and record songs. I hope I can make a career of it, so that I can help people.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner myself and I was lucky to have the support of my family to get me through.  I would love to make someone else's dreams come true now!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children each day, teaching them, helping them, keeping them safe, warm and fed.

lenders.name: Adrienne & Shaune
lenders.occupation: stay at home mom & heavy equipment hauling
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to feel like we're helping out.

lenders.name: Thyra
lenders.loan_because: Friends and relatives helped me out once when I struggled with a small business.  I'd like to pass that on.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with college students and their families to help them finance a college education.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I want to be the change I would like to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
"Ignorance is bliss..."
"if you knew you would be in a fight for your life tomorrow, would you train harder today?"
"ma! The meatloaf!"

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help others who have not been given the same opportunities as I.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at several colleges.  Most of my students are in the nursing profession.

lenders.name: shannon
lenders.loan_because: I feel grateful to have been born in America and want to give others the same opportunities we have here.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my family and I go to school to become a Nurse

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: Where's the downside?
lenders.occupational_info: Social work

lenders.name: Don & Susie
lenders.loan_because: We've been helped by others and we'd like to return the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people find homes and business locations.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel connected to people in the world, and it feels good to know I'm contributing to the fulfillment of someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a graduate program assistant in a university. Typical duties for me are enrolling students in courses, setting up audio-visual equipment, and providing course material online for students.

lenders.name: Manu
lenders.loan_because: I'm able to.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people.  And I love doing it through Kiva because unlike a lot of other orginizations where you can just donate money, with Kiva you actually see who you're donating to and you know a little bit about them.  It makes it more personal and I like that a lot.

lenders.name: Renoda
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy giving to those who want to better themselves, their families and their communities.

lenders.name: Tracey-ann
lenders.loan_because: To feel good,to make someone smile.

lenders.name: Clark
lenders.loan_because: I know what it means to have someone believe in your dream and put their money where their mouth is.  My father has always supported my wild and crazy endeavors and now I'd like to support yours!
lenders.occupational_info: I rent cameras out to producers and cameramen who create motion pictures, documentaries and other multimedia for entertainment and education.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I want to start a business of my own and know how hard it is to find funding.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying so that I can achieve my goals and be successful.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I think it's good karma to do what we can to help others who are really working hard for their goals.

lenders.name: Yoshi
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people who can help themselves!  I want to make a difference in people's lives for future success.

lenders.name: Mikini
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone realize their dream.  Everyone deserves a chance to become a success story, no matter how big or how small their goals are.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the realm of Information Technology in the area of Security.
